tweets.text:
Since #AI bros are all showing off things they’ve “made”…

I made this.

Twenty five years ago, I drew this animation by hand, with pencil, on paper, frame by frame on fours (AI “filmmakers” will have to look up what that means) by slugging the timing (again, look it up) below
tweets.author: John "F" Fountain

tweets.text:
The Global Risks Report 2026 is live.

From #geoeconomic tensions and #inequality to #AI-driven disruption, the report outlines the risks shaping the next decade, and why rebuilding cooperation is more important than ever.

Read the full report: https://weforum.org/publications/global-risks-report-2026/…

#risks26
tweets.author: World Economic Forum
